Text: Happy New Year to you! What a great posting! Thanks so much for this and all your great works. Don't miss this one  kids...

Thank you for sharing.

For more Steve Hoffman remasters and high quality releases, look at the uploads from
http://thepiratebay.org/user/mofie108/
I recommend the 3 Creedence Clearwater Revival (on page 2) for a truly amazing sound.
Notice that the 3 CCR discs are .wv (wavpack) lossless format, and you'll need a command line tool to unpack to .wav (or a codec). Google is your friend.
